import React, { Component, createRef } from 'react' import { Comment, Input, Sticky, Menu } from 'semantic-ui-react' const MessagesShow = ({messages, currentUser, matchedUser}) => { console.log('matched user', matchedUser) const messageComments = messages.map(message=>{ const author = message.sender_id === currentUser.id ? currentUser : matchedUser return {author.display_name}
{message.created_at}
 {message.content} Reply }) const contextRef = createRef() return (
{messageComments}
) } export default MessagesShow
